title: Beef and Sausage Chilli
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '700g minced beef', '2 fresh chorizo-style sausages, cut in half, then sliced', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, rinsed and drained', '1 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '1 medium onion, diced', '1 dessertspoon ground coriander', '1 dessertspoon ground cumin', '1 dessertspoon curry powder', '1 dessertspoon chilli powder', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '140g tomato puree', '125ml beef stock', '125ml red wine', 'salt and pepper to taste']
